group_1.narration: Even after we returned to Kamihama,@Momoko and I still weren't on speaking terms.@Things were just too awkward...

group_1.textRight: ...So I guess you guys didn't find the@treasure in the end.
Must've been awkward for you to come@back here, huh?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, well…

group_1.textRight: Judging from what you've said,
I don't think either of you did anything@wrong...

group_1.textLeft: No, it's my fault for bein' too complacent@with Miyo's situation...

group_1.textRight: There's no way around it, though.@It's a local custom.
You're handling this way more maturely@than I thought you would, Rena.

group_1.textLeft: The way you said that...makes it obvious@you're making fun of me!
...Thank you both for bein' so considerate.
But I'm never gonna be satisfied with@the fact I did nothing...
...I'm sure the Coordinator's gonna give me@an earful the next time I show up.
That's why I wanna steer clear until@I resolve things in myself...

group_1.textRight: I see...

group_1.textLeft: So I'm sorry to saddle you with this, but can@you get this hand mirror back to her?

group_1.textRight: You're the one who borrowed it, though.@Shouldn't you be the one to return it?

group_1.textLeft: I should...but right now...

group_1.textRight: ...Fine. We'll do it for you.
But you owe us.
Once you get out of this funk, our next round of@ice cream or parfaits or whatever will be on you!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...that's a small price to pay.

group_1.textRight: Hello!

group_1.textLeft: Are you in, Mitama?

group_1.textCenter: Oh my, if it isn't Rena and Kaede! Welcome!

group_1.textLeft: Greetings.

group_1.textRight: Oh, I didn't realize the Tokime Clan@was here, too.

group_1.textLeft: I'm sorry, but we're in the middle of@something...may you wait a little while?

group_1.textRight: We're just here to drop off something@from Momoko. It won't be a minute.

group_1.textLeft: Momoko…?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, this hand mirror.

group_1.textLeft: Oh… Thank you.

group_1.textRight: It seemed like Momoko wanted to return@it to you herself...

group_1.textLeft: I know it must be very awkward for her@to come see me...
Still, I'm glad she didn't come.
We were just talking about what happened@back in the village, you see.

group_1.textRight: What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: Apparently, that girl, Miyo, tried to run away@with that boy she loved...

group_1.textRight: [chara:100901:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Like...an elopement?!

group_1.textLeft: She failed, however, and was taken back@to the village.
It's reminiscent of that story with@the Diviner and the sailor...
As a member of the head family, I asked that the@branch family be lenient in their punishment.
Even so, it seems the boy has been banned@from entering the village...

group_1.textRight: That's so harsh...
After that incident, our families became@concerned about our doings as well.
The curfew at Suitoku Temple has thus@been set to 6 PM.

group_1.textLeft: Even though I know how things came to this,@it's still a total mess...
We're totally screwed!

group_1.textRight: I don't think we should tell Momoko about@that elopement, do you...?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... I'm sure she'll be convinced@it's all her fault...

group_1.textRight: Then we'll try our best to ensure word@doesn't spread.

group_1.textLeft: If I see Momoko, I'm sure it's all going@to spill out...
I think...it may be best I avoid her for@a while.

group_1.textRight: You sound EXACTLY like Momoko when@you say that!
Look, I don't care what's going through your head,@but you need to go make up with her NOW.
Sitting around and moping won't change@a thing!

group_1.textLeft: Yes...you're right.
*Sigh*

group_1.narration: Back then, we had thought it was best@not to interfere because we were outsiders...@In truth, however, that fact might have been@precisely why we could change things...
